meanings.sent1: She felt bashfuller than usual at the party.
meanings.sent2: The shy kitten became even bashfuller when approached by strangers.
meanings.sent3: The bashfuller puppy hid behind its owner's legs when meeting new people.
meanings.sent4: The bashfuller flowers in the garden seemed to shy away from the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: Her bashfuller demeanor made her seem even more endearing to others.

meanings.sent1: The bashfuller in the group blushed when complimented.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the bashfuller in the class for her quiet nature.
meanings.sent3: The bashfuller at the party avoided eye contact with everyone.
meanings.sent4: The bashfuller in the office preferred to work alone to avoid attention.
meanings.sent5: The bashfuller's timid smile charmed those around them.
